channel.title: Oh my god, please help me
channel.description:
I think im a little outa my deapth...
::I made a server using the testscape source, using tutorials from this forum, added a mod island, npcs sasying when im on, and i cant get on, i put in my IP, i get on the server, get the black screen for two seconds, the get DC'd::
Any help appreciated...

item.title: Oh my god, please help me
item.dc:creator: @Brad_c Brad_c
item.source: Oh my god, please help me

item.title: Oh my god, please help me
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

blakeman8192:

If you can connect to other servers, your client is fine, and its the errors in your server. If you can’t connect to servers, you get the same black screen, then its your computer, or your client.

you are 100% wrong…

With a client you can connect to any server… but some servers need a newer cache or need something in a client so the client wont crash when you try to log onto the server. Basically his problem is within what he added. If he added something and it compiled fine but he cant get on but can get on in other servers it is his source that is causing the problem NOT THE Client

Read full topic
item.source: Oh my god, please help me

item.title: Oh my god, please help me
item.dc:creator: @Brad_c Brad_c
item.description:
@Brad_c wrote:

KK, i can get on other servers, want me to copy and paste the compilers bit so you ot can tel me whats wrong?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2007, 03:15:53 PM[/size][hr]Ah i cant C&p it -_-

Read full topic

item.source: Oh my god, please help me

item.title: Oh my god, please help me
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You probably had errors when you compiled. The server will not run correctly when it compiles with errors. You will get the “black-screen” thing. Unless you know how to fix these errors, I suggest you re-download Testscape, and start all over again.

Read full topic
